name: Charmed!
description:
Charmed! is a third person waved-based Beat em’ Up set in a dreamlike chaotic world. Players follow Felicity as she attempts to control her newfound power, defeat enemies destroying her city, and rescue her mother. Players swap between the abilities bestowed by Felicity’s charm bracelet to take on enemies in unique and novel ways, catering to a variety of playstyles. The player traverses various parts of the city while destroying progressively denser and stronger waves of monsters.

I worked as a Level Designer to create and decorate numerous areas throughout the first level as well as the final area of the second level.
